ValidationRule.description: Lead Status is marked as Lost then Lost Reason is mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( $RecordType.Name = "Buyer Used Car", $RecordType.Name = "Seller Car"
), ISCHANGED(status__c ) && ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Lost') && ISBLANK( TEXT(Lost_Reason__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lost Reason is mandatory if status is selected as Lost
